data.name: Legends of Crystal
data.detailed_description:
Strengthen Your Bonds With Companion and Clash In Battles By Awakening The Summoning Power As You've Never Experienced Before!




"Long, long ago, life can be balanced because of the Crystal, a core of the universe, which holds massive power. This leads the Demons to fight over the Crystal for the sake to be the strongest in the whole world. The war made the Crystal shattered and flung to all over the ages and timeline. It caused the universe to be in chaos."



Combat in Legends of Crystal is done in classic turn-based style, allowing you to read the flow of combat and think a few steps ahead. unique mechanics with brings a target skill to the summoner. If used during combat, the Summon acts on behalf of the summoner. The target becomes an ally, may become a target, and may be damaged and/or killed. Strategy is crucial as carelessness is heavily punished even against the most common of enemies. Boss fights take this to another level, pushing your tactics, team composition, and character customization to the limit, each fight demanding deeper mastery of the battlefield than the last. Harder difficulty levels are also available, turning boss encounters into intricate deadly puzzles for you to solve.





  • Immersive Realm - A world with a classic storyline that will delight both veterans and fresh RPG fans, played with advanced interactions, visual effects, and a variety of dungeons.
  • Awaken The Summoning Power - Summon the Mythology Creatures, awakens summons skill with defeated boss and the hidden boss monster inside the adventure, and release their power!
  • Exploration Travel Through Time - Journey to the forgotten past, the present day, the far future, and the end of time with adventures, puzzles, and secrets to discover.
  • Strengthen The Bonds - Recruit Characters and build a friendship with your companion from adventure to discover powerful combination abilities, each with their own effects.
  • Strategic Planning - Configure your characters’ skills into a combo with some state effects that reaches their maximum potential inside the battles.
  • Classic Turn-Based Gameplay - Classically inspired turn-based combat with random enemy encounters, made amusing
  • Character Driven - Customize heroes with unique stances and techniques and all playable characters follow the typical “Job Class” style

data.short_description: Forge your bond with your companions in this fantasy turn-based combat RPG. With the future chaos from the rise of ancient evil, only reincarnate heroes must travel across the timeline to restore the "Crystal", which is the key to preserving the time.
data.reviews:
“Legends Of Crystal is a good RPG game and I did find the Final Fantasy turn-based combat mechanic quite interesting for a 2d game. If I am to compliment the game I can say that the music is really nice as well as the pixel art also was fun to play and quite enjoyable.”
4.1 – GameEXP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.1 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1240x720 or better Display
